title: Possible early morning vocalization at Fool's Hollow Lake
observed: WELL ME AND MY FAMILY WERE ALL OUT CAMPING AND FISHING AT A GREAT LAKE THATS IN SHOW LOW AZ CALLED FOOLS HOLLOW LAKE.  IT WAS OUR LAST NIGHT THERE AFTER A GREAT STAY AND LOTS OF FUN WE HAD A NICE DINNER AND ALL WANTED TO HIT THE HAY. IT WAS ABOUT 9:30 OR 10 PM WE ALL WENT TO BED.  I HAVE HUNTED ALL MY LIFE AND THE SOUND I HEARD I HAVE NEVER HEARD BEFORE IT WAS VERY LOUD AND OFF IN THE DISTANCE IT WENT ON FOR ABOUT A MINUTE IT ALMOST SOUNDED LIKE IT WAS ANGRY. THIS HAPPENED AT ABOUT 3:45AM MONDAY JUNE 11TH 2007 I JUMPED OUT OF BED AND COULD HEAR A RABBIT SCREAM LIKE SOMETHING WAS KILLING IT AFTER THAT  I DIDNT HEAR IT AGAIN. IN THE MORNING ME AND MY FAMILY AND FRIENDS GOT UP HAVING COFFEE AND I ASKED SOME OF MY FRIENDS IF THEY HEARD THAT HOWL AND THE RABBIT SCREAMING AND A LONG TIME FRIEND OF MINE SAID HE WAS WAKENED BY THE SOUND AND HE ASWELL IS A LONG TIME HUNTER AND HAS NEVER HEARD NOTHING LIKE THAT.
